title: SenservaPro
descriptionMarkdown: The SenservaPro connector provides an viewing experience for your SenservaPro scanning logs. View dashboards of your data, use queries to hunt & explore, and create custom alerts for your needs. Start your security journey today

dataTypes.name: SenservaPro
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
DashboardTest_CL
            | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

value:
DashboardTest_CL
            | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
            | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(30d)
